page.title: 06THE CHURCHES IN 1985.
page.content: Most of the Churches in the previous text still exist.The various religions have joined together to pray for peace in the world.Each Church assists deprived countries.On 6th. JULY 1985 all the churches are combining to raise money for a water supply in Uganda by holding a Fete.The Catholic Church supports a village in Peru named Recuay.The P7 class who wrote this text raised Â£250 by organising a Coffee Morning in their School.Every religious group plays its part to make Troon a caring community.At Christmas time TROON unites to praise the birth of Christ.Religion plays a major part in the life in TROON.
